title: The Strongest Landlord in History - Novel Updates

description:
The Strongest Landlord in History

Once prosperous Lin family, Is in decline. 

Lin Lan, the only heir of family must fight to defend his people from the world, who are eying their greedy eyes to Lin Lan's rich land. And must protect his family.>
